${modID}:MulticastCard.NAME: Multicast
${modID}:MulticastCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a skill is played, has a 40% chance to play an extra copy.

${modID}:RecklessSpeedCard.NAME: Reckless Speed
${modID}:RecklessSpeedCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn. Lose 1 strength after every attack played for the remainder of that turn.

${modID}:ThisIsAKnife.NAME: This is a knife
${modID}:ThisIsAKnife.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a shiv is drawn, increase its damage by !M! and draw !M! cards.
